channel.title: New On THIS forum <as active user>
channel.description:
Okay. so im new to the whole 667 scene and i decided to try to use Matrix as a Base to learn it on. as it seemed the cleanest. I have been working on it for a few weeks and i got alot of stuff scripted that wasn't scripted before.
I.E Duel arena. Pest control and a lot of the shop NPC's that was easy. But now i have the " Donate to spawn Limitation i am dreading so much. i know basics to the server as i owned a 317 A LOONG time ago. back when zezima was top dog. but now i just cant seem to figure out how to add donator status to my character. i edited it and put me as Mod + admin. But i cant spawn things still.
I dont want to remove the items from the donator list. as in a few weeks or so when i am done scripting. i want to host the source. <of course giving 80% cred to matrix cause i used his source. but i can honestly say i have put in a ton of work to improve the server enough to say its deff not a leech. i got the ring of dueling scripted. with all working tele's as well as Glory's as well as Karamja ship and Karamja island. + the volcano and the fight caves. and i would estimate about 75% of all npc's spawned and scripted.
And yet im too dumb to locate and figure out how to make myself a Donator on my server.
If Possible could someone assist me with it.
either that. or i don't want a donate system at all. but rather convert it to where only Mods And Admins can spawn things. sadly the same thing. i dont know where the donator system stretches to and the commands for donations are hard to tell where they end. Help =/
after a few weeks of this i got a head ache...
Stil working on a bit. =) but im proud.
Thanks in advanced for any help guys,

item.title: New On THIS forum <as active user>
item.dc:creator: @Broken-Reality Broken-Reality
item.description:
@Broken-Reality wrote:

No problem, if you ever need any help, just send me a pm!

Read full topic

item.title: New On THIS forum <as active user>
item.dc:creator: @Broken-Reality Broken-Reality
item.description:
@Broken-Reality wrote:

Okay, first of all to make yourself donator, you need to go in commands.java unless you have the stuff what is able to open a “.p” file, so as i was saying, you just go in commands.java and Search something like this code[/code]

Mine looks like this; if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("permdonator")&& (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Dylan"))) {

And there is a monthly donator command where it only makes them donator for 1 month, you can change this to any command you like unless you like that but i dont And the monthly donator will be something like this,

And if you do not want Donators to spawn items and just make it admin or whatever you want, you just change the Player rights it would be something like player.isDonator(1))
And all you would do is find the donator part and change with this;

then save and Compile and there you go.
Have fun making your server hope you have fun

Read full topic
item.source: New On THIS forum <as active user>

Okay. so im new to the whole 667 scene and i decided to try to use Matrix as a Base to learn it on. as it seemed the cleanest.
I have been working on it for a few weeks and i got alot of stuff scripted that wasn’t scripted before.

I.E Duel arena.
Pest control
and a lot of the shop NPC’s that was easy.
But now i have the " Donate to spawn Limitation i am dreading so much.
i know basics to the server as i owned a 317 A LOONG time ago.
back when zezima was top dog.
but now i just cant seem to figure out how to add donator status to my character.
i edited it and put me as Mod + admin.
But i cant spawn things still.

I dont want to remove the items from the donator list. as in a few weeks or so when i am done scripting. i want to host the source. <of course giving 80% cred to matrix cause i used his source. but i can honestly say i have put in a ton of work to improve the server enough to say its deff not a leech.
i got the ring of dueling scripted. with all working tele’s as well as Glory’s
as well as Karamja ship and Karamja island. + the volcano and the fight caves.

i dont know where the donator system stretches to and the commands for donations are hard to tell where they end.
Help =/

after a few weeks of this i got a head ache…
